mapExplanation.addMapMarkers: Modify the setting of mapContext, you can add or delete markers, markers carry labels and callout bubbles.
mapExplanation.addCircles: Modify the setting of mapContext, you can add or delete circles.
mapExplanation.addMapPolyGons: Modify the setting of mapContext, you can add or delete polygans.
mapExplanation.addMapPolyLine: Modify the setting of mapContext, you can add or delete polyline.
mapExplanation.addGroundOverlay: Create a custom image layer and the image will be scaled as the map is scaled.
mapExplanation.getCenterLocation: Get the latitude and longitude of the current map center.
mapExplanation.getRegion: Acquire the scope of the field of view of the current map.
mapExplanation.getRotate: Get the rotation angle of the current map.
mapExplanation.getScale: Acquire the degree of scaling of the current map.
mapExplanation.getSkew: Get the tilt angle of the current map.
mapExplanation.includePoints: Scale the field of view to display all latitude and longitude degrees.
mapExplanation.moveAlong: Move along a specified path markerFor track playback and other scenarios.
mapExplanation.moveToLocation: Move the center of the map to the current set position.
mapExplanation.openMapApp: Pull up the map app and select navigation.
mapExplanation.fromScreenLocation: Get the latitude and longitude corresponding to the point on the screen.
mapExplanation.setLocMarkerIcon: Set anchor icon, support network path, local path, code package path
mapExplanation.setCenterOffset: Set Map Center Point Offset, Back Down for Growth
mapExplanation.toScreenLocation: Get the screen coordinates corresponding to latitude and longitude. The origin of the coordinates is the upper left corner of the map.
mapExplanation.setBoundary: Limit the display area of the map. This interface also limits the minimum zoom integer level of the map.
